name: Entomologas
description: This application is dedicated to people willing to discover the surrounding world and insects in particular. Application author is a biology and computer science student from Lithuania.  * 150 Lithuanian insect groups and species from all the major orders with high quality photos, interesting facts and detailed information about appearance, life cycle, distribution, ecology, evolution. * Simple information dedicated to introduce with insects. * Quiz with 300 questions, which will help to know Lithuanian insects easier! * Learning progress meters near every insect group, which will fill up each time quiz questions are answered correctly. * Order key, which can be used for educational purposes. * Ability to zoom pictures by moving fingers down or pinching with them. * Application does not need internet connection!  Application can be freely used for the teaching purposes. It will be forever free and ad less!
